## height-app-api package

Unofficial TypeScript Wrapper for Height App API

## Remarks

This is a unofficial TypeScript wrapper for [Height API](https://www.notion.so/API-documentation-643aea5bf01742de9232e5971cb4afda)<!-- -->. This wrapper is not affiliated with Height team.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Height](./height-app-api.height.md) | A Wrapper for the [Height API](https://www.notion.so/API-documentation-643aea5bf01742de9232e5971cb4afda) |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HeightConfig](./height-app-api.heightconfig.md) | Configuration for Height API Wrapper |
